caller_intent: The caller, Ron Marshall, is the treasurer of Pilot Mountain Masonic Lodge and needs assistance with paying the lodge's insurance.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed Alliance Insurance offers commercial insurance services.
Agent attempted to transfer the caller to a commercial agent.
Agent placed the caller on hold with a message about the customer portal and text support options.
summary: Ron Marshall, treasurer of Pilot Mountain Masonic Lodge, sought help paying the lodge's insurance. The agent attempted to transfer him to a commercial agent but placed him on hold, offering the customer portal and text support as alternatives. The call was not fully resolved but directed to appropriate resources.
